openerp.data:
############################################################################################################################ ### Cambios en la acci√≥n para agregar Choferes ###
Drivers hr.employee form kanban,tree,form [('tms_category','=','driver')] {}
Click to add a new driver.
With just a quick glance on the OpenERP driver screen, you can easily find all the information you need for each person; contact data, job position, availability, etc.
############################################################################################################################ ### Cambios en la vista de Product ###
Products ir.actions.act_window product.product form tree,form,kanban
[('tms_category','in',('transportable','freight','move','insurance','highway_tolls','other','real_expense','madeup_expense','salary','salary_retention','salary_discount','negative_balance','fuel','indirect_expense'))]
Click to define a new Freight related product.
You can define products for everything related to Freight Management.
